body:
Okta isn't always the easiest to integrate with, because applications need to be created in the okta admin. We've used OIDC with Google, which itself talks to Okta, but only for public sites and not for admin panels.

There are a few questions that need to be addresses, like how would we manage groups membership? I do want to get rid of direct LDAP as early as possible, but for the time being this is what Normandy should use. (Note: nginx can take care of it for you).
